Desc.entry: Provided by Sheffield City Council's Children and Young People's Service. Provides advice to parents, schools and other professionals on the special educational needs of children aged 0-19 years. Assessment, both psychological and educational, is provided together with support for children with intellectual, physical, emotional, social and behavioural difficulties. Offers support and advice to parents on child development issues and runs parenting skills courses. Where parents/carers are concerned about educational or school issues, their first contact should be the school special needs co-ordinator.
